Â Fell in love with this as we just came out of a weekend that pushed me to my limits and back again - double snow days will do that to a mama :) Now that we're sliding into the week and I can look back and see myself - I so easily fall prey to the moment and forget that these little ones have such fragile sense of selves... They will become the people we are instilling all our love and wisdom into.

Food for thought...
